Literature.Title: A convenient solid-phase strategy for the synthesis of antimicrobial cyclic lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Vila S, Badosa E, Montesinos E, Feliu L, Planas M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:67% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:78% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=6.2-12.5µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=12.5-25µM),Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=25-50µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici ATCC 201829(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Penicillium expansum EPS 26(MIC=>50µM)
